rows.title: Other parents’ questions

intro_text.eng:
Many parents really want to support their teens, but struggle to talk about sensitive topics like body changes and intimate relationships.

Let’s look at a few questions from other parents to help you get started.

rows.intro_text:
Many parents really want to support their teens, but struggle to talk about sensitive topics like body changes and intimate relationships.

Let’s look at a few questions from other parents to help you get started.

rows.title: Warning signs

intro_text.eng:
People around us can make us feel respected, happy and safe. But sometimes, people can pressure us and make us feel uncomfortable. This can happen to teenagers and adults. 

When we know the warning signs, we can try and stop the situation to stay safe.

Let’s look at some scenarios.

rows.intro_text:
People around us can make us feel respected, happy and safe. But sometimes, people can pressure us and make us feel uncomfortable. This can happen to teenagers and adults. 

When we know the warning signs, we can try and stop the situation to stay safe.

Let’s look at some scenarios.

rows.title: Use your voice

intro_text.eng:
When we do not feel safe, we are allowed to do, say, and believe anything that helps keep us safe. The goal is to get away!

Let’s think about the scenario when @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2 was forced into a car by a man.

How could @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2 use her voice to get away?

rows.intro_text:
When we do not feel safe, we are allowed to do, say, and believe anything that helps keep us safe. The goal is to get away!

Let’s think about the scenario when @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2 was forced into a car by a man.

How could @global.w_svp_teen_girl_2 use her voice to get away?

rows.title: Use your body

intro_text.eng:
When our voice does not stop the situation, we can use our bodies to defend ourselves. 

@global.w_svp_teen_girl_2’s attacker has some weak spots she can target in order to get away. The same can work for you:

rows.intro_text:
When our voice does not stop the situation, we can use our bodies to defend ourselves. 

@global.w_svp_teen_girl_2’s attacker has some weak spots she can target in order to get away. The same can work for you:

rows.title: Name your feelings

intro_text.eng:
When we are going through a difficult time, it can help to talk about or write down how we feel. 

Let's practice naming feelings.

rows.intro_text:
When we are going through a difficult time, it can help to talk about or write down how we feel. 

Let's practice naming feelings.

rows.outro_text:
There are more ideas on activities you can do together in the @global.parent_centre. 

Do not worry if things do not go well the first time you try these activities with your teen. The most important thing is spending time with each other and learning together.
rows.title: What could I do?

intro_text.eng: Let’s think of activities you can do with your teen to help them learn.

rows.intro_text: Let’s think of activities you can do with your teen to help them learn.
